thread.title: Compulocks First to Announce New Surface Pro 4 Kiosk

author: cbs8
title: Compulocks First to Announce New Surface Pro 4 Kiosk
text:
Compulocks
Microsoft Surface Pro 4 was recently announced, and Compulocks has already designed a full line of enclosures, mounts, locks and kiosks to accommodate it.
AUSTIN, Texas , October 13,
The Surface Pro 4 was one of the most hyped tablets of the year, and it was recently unveiled at Microsoft's Windows 10 event. The new Surface Pro includes a number of performance upgrades, but as far as design the biggest update comes in the form of a thinner bezel and larger display. Security hardware manufacturer Compulocks has already announced a full line of Space Surface Pro 4 kiosk , stands, enclosures and locks.
The kiosk lineup is being designed for the new Surface Pro 4 with features that will include storage for the magnetic stylus pen and Touch Keyboard security. Among the solutions is the innovative Surface Pro 4 Security Stand . It provides two levels of security in that it can be bolted to a flat surface or used as a free moving kiosk when paired with a Surface Pro 4 Cable Lock , ideal as a Surface display stand, information kiosk or desk companion.
For retail and hospitality environments, Compulocks recommends the Slide Surface Pro 4 POS Kiosk . As on all Slide POS models, the sides of the kiosk are open to allow the widest variety of card readers. Any reader that uses the headphone or USB such as Square or PayPal Here will fit on the Pro 4 POS Kiosk.
As productivity super machines, Surface tablets have famously been incorporated in a wide variety of workplaces. Some of the better examples are the NFL who uses them for their instant replay viewings, and every LeanBox health food vending machine that has a Compulocks Surface Pro Enclosure on it. LeanBox said, " Compulocks state of the art hardware houses the brains of our LeanBox system, the Surface Pro. It is the perfect solution for both functionality and design. "
About Compulocks
Compulocks is the premier designer and manufacturer for innovative security and display solutions of the highest quality.
